abstract: French prosecutors say retired French police officer who was on Air France flight that had to make emergency landing in Kenya due to bomb hoax has been arrested; officer's connection to hoax is unclear.
lead_paragraph: The French passenger was arrested in Paris after the flight from Mauritius was diverted because a suspicious object had been found in one of the aircraft’s bathrooms.

headline.main: Ex-Police Officer Held After Air France Bomb Scare
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; France: Passenger Is Detained After Bomb Hoax on Air France Jet

snippet: The French passenger was arrested in Paris after the flight from Mauritius was diverted because a suspicious object had been found in one of the aircraft’s bathrooms.
